name: Don't fall behind
description:
This game was made in 3 days for Ludum Dare 46 in JAM Mode. 

This is our first attempt to make a stealth action game. Successful or not - you tell us :)

Use”WASD” or arrow buttons to move the player.

Use “C” button for enable/disable stealth mode.

Enemies see and hear you, but you can also hear them from afar.

Use headphones for a better gaming experience.

We're a team of two people. We mainly used: Unity, Blender and Photoshop.
